preset_info.title: Malsp (beta1 twodotzero)
preset_info.description: Open Material Lock Screen Preset for KLCK Pro
preset_info.author: brianKordy

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure the screen lock and its elements

settings/conficon.title: ConfIcon
settings/conficon.description: Lock Icon: Hide the lock icon at the bottom of the lock screen (On: Hide, Off: Show)

settings/confstba.title: ConfStBa
settings/confstba.description: Hide Status Bar: Hide the top status bar (On: Hide, Off: Show)

settings/confphnc.title: ConfPHNC
settings/confphnc.description: Notification content (Experimental): Reduce the content of notifications to just the Name of the app and the time, hiding content that may be sensitive

settings/confnvba.title: ConfNvBa
settings/confnvba.description: Hide Navigation Hint: Hides the bottom (Line) indicator for lock screen navigation gestures (On: Hide, Off: Show)

settings/conffnts.title: ConfFnts
settings/conffnts.description: Text Fonts: Change the fonts of the interface and clock face

settings/conffnts/uigenfnt.title: UiGenFnt
settings/conffnts/uigenfnt.description: this option is not available in this version

settings/confbist.title: ConfBISt
settings/confbist.description: Battery icon style: Change the style of the icon displayed at the top right
settings/confbist.entries: Circle, Battery Portrait, Battery Landscape, Only Text

settings/confmclk.title: ConfMClk
settings/confmclk.description: Force small clock: Always show the small clock even if there are no notifications

settings/confcarr.title: ConfCarr
settings/confcarr.description: Custom carrier name: Change the name of the carrier for the text you want (Leave empty to return to the default name)

legal/notice.title: NOTICE
legal/notice.entries: This komponent is a recreation of the widget seen in Google's 'Android 12' and 'Material You' promotional material from Google I/O 2021.
